front.title: Internet Printing Protocol/1.1: IPP Event Notification Change History

abstract.t: This document contains the change history for the development of the IPP Notification specification. The IPP Notification specification is an extension to the IPP/1.0 & IPP/1.1 model that allows clients to subscribe to printing related events. Subscriptions include 'Per-Job Submission subscriptions' and 'Per-Printer subscriptions'. Either subscription may specify job and/or printer events. This specification has been developed starting in the Fall of 1997.
